Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Exchange
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Exchange, 83rd, South Shore, 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Exchange, 83rd, South Shore, 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Exchange.

Allow extra travel time.
